install

		#

		python3 moves/install.py

			python3 moves/stage_remove.py

			python3 moves/stage_add.py

		pip install poetry poetry-plugin-export

installations venv

			poetry config virtualenvs.path /path/to/your/directory
			poetry env use python3
			poetry shell
